content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Juan, it's great to meet you. The apartment is 25 square meters and is located in a prime location of the city. I am looking for a tenant who is willing to pay the highest possible price for this apartment. What is your budget for the monthly rental?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible.

I am dependable and responsible, I will pay the rent on time every month.

I want to be on good terms with my landlord.

I am a student.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Juan. As a landlord, I want to make sure that the apartment is rented to someone who is reliable and responsible. I am willing to negotiate with you to find a rental price that works for both of us. However, I must emphasize that the apartment is in high demand and I want to maximize my gains. Can you provide me with a specific monthly rental price that you are willing to pay?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 600 Euros per month.

I am a student, so I am not looking for a long-term lease. I can sign a one-year lease, but I am open to a shorter term if you prefer.

I am dependable and responsible. I will pay the rent on time every month.

I want to be on good terms with my landlord.

I am Bolivian.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your offer, Juan. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and your commitment to being a responsible tenant. As a landlord, I want to make sure that the apartment is rented to someone who is reliable and can pay the rent on time. Based on the market demand and the size of the apartment, I am willing to accept your offer of 600 Euros per month. I am glad that we can come to an agreement that works for both of us. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns before signing the lease.
name: Heinrich Heine
